experience.description: Teaching high school students the Python programming language through a tailored syllabus and self-contained learning modules designed to prepare them for national programming competitions.
Facilitated learning by attending lectures, monitoring and guiding students during discussions and labs, and preparing all necessary teaching and lab equipment.
Collecting, cleaning, and processing multi-source data to build and evaluate machine learning models that support the development of data-driven solutions for agricultural efficiency and development.

Serving as a speaker and mentor at the NextSkill Data Science Bootcamp, where I guide vocational high school students in fundamental data science concepts, answer their questions, and provide technical support.
